languages.text: "Любопытно. Тела огиров исчезают после гибели. Эти экземпляры, очевидно, ущербные, раз они все еще здесь".
"Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."
languages.original_text: "Любопытно. Тела огиров исчезают после гибели. Эти экземпляры, очевидно, ущербные, раз они все еще здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

traits.locale_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

languages.text: 「妙だな。オグハイルの遺体は死後に消滅する。ここに残ってるってことは、この標本はどこか欠陥があるに違いないぜ」
languages.original_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

traits.locale_text: 「妙だな。オグハイルの遺体は死後に消滅する。ここに残ってるってことは、この標本はどこか欠陥があるに違いないぜ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “真古怪，遗落者的尸体本该在死亡后消失。这些标本既然依然留在这里，那就肯定是有什么缺陷。”
languages.original_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

traits.locale_text: “真古怪，遗落者的尸体本该在死亡后消失。这些标本既然依然留在这里，那就肯定是有什么缺陷。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Étrange. Les cadavres des Oghyrs disparaissent après leur mort. Ces spécimens doivent être déficients, puisqu'ils sont toujours là. »
languages.original_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

traits.locale_text: « Étrange. Les cadavres des Oghyrs disparaissent après leur mort. Ces spécimens doivent être déficients, puisqu'ils sont toujours là. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Qué extraño. Los cuerpos de los Oghyr se desintegran al morir. Estos especímenes deben de tener algún defecto, ya que siguen aquí».
languages.original_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

traits.locale_text: «Qué extraño. Los cuerpos de los Oghyr se desintegran al morir. Estos especímenes deben de tener algún defecto, ya que siguen aquí».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Seltsam. Die Leichen von Oghyr verschwinden nach ihrem Tod. Diese Exemplare müssen defekt sein, weil sie noch hier sind."
languages.original_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

traits.locale_text: "Seltsam. Die Leichen von Oghyr verschwinden nach ihrem Tod. Diese Exemplare müssen defekt sein, weil sie noch hier sind."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Tuhaf. Oghyr bedenleri öldükten sonra yok olurlar. Bu numuneler hâlâ burada olduklarına göre bir şekilde dejenere olmuş olmalılar."
languages.original_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

traits.locale_text: "Tuhaf. Oghyr bedenleri öldükten sonra yok olurlar. Bu örnekler hâlâ burada olduklarına göre bir şekilde dejenere olmuş olmalılar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."
